entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
